title: Strengthening E-Learning Competencies: Gamification Learning Design Based on Let’s Play (LP)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex social phenomena in a gamified environment using LP-format simulation content.
Learners can engage in collaborative problem-solving in peer learning contexts via real-time chat functions at least three times.
Learners can connect game events (e.g., quests, boss battles) to learning activities (concept comprehension, case analysis, project assignments) and explain their relationships.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
